channel.title: OaR Uncut Installation
channel.description: After updating Steam, I booted up black mesa to play a little OaR Uncut. I found to my frustration that my mods had been deleted (On A Rail Loop Mod & On a Rail Uncut). I cannot seem to be able to install OaR Uncut. I have repeatedly extracted the files to my BMS folder, extracting them all at once, the whole folder a time, extracting the [b]individual files[/b] to my game, to no avail. Help?

item.title: OaR Uncut Installation
item.dc:creator: Retrotrek
item.description:
After updating Steam, I booted up black mesa to play a little OaR Uncut. I found to my frustration that my mods had been deleted (On A Rail Loop Mod & On a Rail Uncut). I cannot seem to be able to install OaR Uncut. I have repeatedly extracted the files to my BMS folder, extracting them all at once, the whole folder a time, extracting the individual files to my game, to no avail. Help?

Read full topic
